titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a taxpayer to elect to deduct either State and local income taxes or State and local sales taxes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S15904-15905)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 11/17/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers to elect to deduct either State and local income taxes or State and local general sales taxes.
